Sections.SectionText: You shrank all the robots! They're so small, it'll take a million years for them to finish terraforming.
Your weapon system made it easier to project my shrinking powers.
It took me seven years to learn the engineering of how this system works.
And one year to forget it.
Zarcon, you will be a formidable addition to intergalactic politics.
Eh, I'm glad to see the planets restored to life.
Plus, I still get a holiday bonus for the discovery, even if Terracom eats a net loss.
And I get to have all these planets named after me - I mean, my favorite character.
These planets are already named. We are the Planets of Zarcon.
Right. You were here first. But maybe just one planet?
